about_the_game:
SSC ARE HIRING


Are you stuck in a dead-end job? Not progressing in your chosen field? Feel like you’re not living your life to its fullest potential? Well, look no further!

Join our 0-hour contract to explore the galaxies! Space Salvage Corporation seeks new candidates for our open Trainee Requisition Operative positions – candidates who are not afraid to explore the 30+ vast intergalactic environments* discovered so far.

Forge your own path! You will be given your very own Space Salvage Collection Pod**, which can be kitted out with 30+ upgrades*** to make your job easier!

Enjoy a truly diverse working day! You won’t be stuck in the same repetitive day-to-day tasks, we have multiple jobs set up for you coming from an extensive list of intergalactic contacts.

And most of all, we want you to become a part of the Space Salvage Corporation family in this lonely universe. If dangerous but rewarding work in service of our dazzling rich shareholders sounds like your kind of thing, apply today!

**sᴘᴀᴄᴇ sᴀʟᴠᴀɢᴇ ᴄᴏʟʟᴇᴄᴛɪᴏɴ ᴘᴏᴅ ʀᴇᴍᴀɪɴs ᴘʀᴏᴘᴇʀᴛʏ ᴏғ ssᴄ; ᴀɴʏ ᴀɴᴅ ᴀʟʟ ᴅᴀᴍᴀɢᴇs ᴡɪʟʟ ʙᴇ ᴘᴀɪᴅ ᴏᴜᴛ ᴏғ ᴛʀᴀɪɴᴇᴇ ʀᴇǫᴜɪsɪᴛɪᴏɴ ᴏᴘᴇʀᴀᴛɪᴏɴ sᴀʟᴀʀʏ
***ᴀʟʟ ᴜᴘɢʀᴀᴅᴇs, ɴᴇᴄᴇssᴀʀʏ ᴏʀ ᴄᴏsᴍᴇᴛɪᴄ, ᴡɪʟʟ ʙᴇ ᴘᴀɪᴅ ᴏᴜᴛ ᴏғ ᴛʀᴀɪɴᴇᴇ ʀᴇǫᴜɪsɪᴛɪᴏɴ ᴏᴘᴇʀᴀᴛɪᴠᴇ's ᴏᴡɴ ᴘᴏᴄᴋᴇᴛ




As a Trainee Requisition Operative, you will manoeuvre your space-pod through beautiful and dynamic interplanetary crash sites. You will be required to scavenge for valuable resources from dubious wreckage left behind by large scale battles or stashed away in minefields.

However, you will not be the only one retrieving goods. Competitors and wandering scavengers are sure to be nearby, so SSC expects you to fight for survival* in these rugged environments engulfed by the unknown.

Do not worry though, you will be accompanied by the pod’s enthusiastic, but amoral AI companion who will track your every movement for us. They will report on your performance and providing valuable advice to help you become the most productive SSC employee you can be!

*ssᴄ ɪs ɴᴏᴛ ᴡɪʟʟɪɴɢ ᴏʀ ᴀʙʟᴇ ᴛᴏ ᴘʀᴏᴠɪᴅᴇ ʙᴀᴄᴋᴜᴘ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ᴇᴠᴇɴᴛ ᴏғ sᴘᴀᴄᴇ ᴄᴏᴍʙᴀᴛ. ғɪʀᴇғɪɢʜᴛs ᴀʀᴇ ᴇɴᴛᴇʀᴇᴅ ɪɴᴛᴏ ᴀᴛ ᴛʀᴀɪɴᴇᴇ ᴏᴘᴇʀᴀᴛɪᴠᴇ's ᴏᴡɴ ʀɪsᴋ.




Your primary responsibilities will involve making yourself available at a moment's notice, to navigate through wreckage and asteroids in search of valuable assets for SSC.

An allowance of no more than one second per day is given to marvel at the beautiful colour palettes of space; your pay will be docked on a per-second basis after this point.

You will be expected to learn to pilot your Collection Pod whilst on the job, following the minimal possible training required under intergalactic law. Not to worry, though-the intuitive and responsive motion control scheme is very easy to pick up, you’ll be fine!

You will be required to navigate the complex inner workings of the galaxy's factions and take on as many jobs as possible to progress your career within Space Salvage Corporation! We are firm believers in our 0-hour contract policy, so any time you’re not out there salvaging, is a waste of yours and the company's time!

Your loyalty and work will be rewarded by a small, but non-negotiable salary which you can use to upgrade your Collection Pod.

Always remember the company motto: in space, no-one can hear you clean!

Job Perks:

  • Explore over two dozen unique and breathtaking environments with varying biomes, skyboxes, architecture, and challenges;
  • Interact with distinct world factions, each with their own objectives that may clash with or align with yours;
  • Become a part of the SSC family and earn promotions and rewards within our corporate structure;
  • Take on a variety of jobs/tasks given to you, Collect all the resources you find in space, you may even find fun collectibles out there!*

*ssᴄ ᴄʟᴀɪᴍs ᴀʟʟ ʀɪɢʜᴛs ᴛᴏ ᴀɴʏ ᴏʙᴊᴇᴄᴛs ᴄᴏʟʟᴇᴄᴛᴇᴅ ᴡʜɪʟᴇ ᴘᴇʀғᴏʀᴍɪɴɢ ʀᴇǫᴜɪsɪᴛɪᴏɴ ᴡᴏʀᴋ. ɪғ ʏᴏᴜ ᴡᴏᴜʟᴅ ʟɪᴋᴇ ᴛᴏ ᴀᴅᴅ ᴛʜᴇsᴇ ᴛᴏ ʏᴏᴜʀ ᴄᴏʟʟᴇᴄᴛɪᴏɴ ᴘᴏᴅ ғᴏʀ ᴄᴏsᴍᴇᴛɪᴄ ᴘᴜʀᴘᴏsᴇs, ᴛʜᴇʏ ᴍᴜsᴛ ʙᴇ ᴘᴜʀᴄʜᴀsᴇᴅ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ssᴄ sᴛᴏʀᴇ.


All potential Space Salvage Corporation Trainee Operatives must:


  • Be able to follow orders and complete tasks on time;
  • Possess the ability to work with under 4 hours of sleep;
  • Demonstrate proven critical thinking, problem-solving and judgement skills;
  • Have extensive knowledge of/experience with pressing buttons and switches;
  • Implement an approach that fosters a non-threatening workplace environment;
  • Demonstrate commitment and ability to work with no breaks in a complex and unfamiliar environment;
  • Demonstrate confidence to navigate through challenging environments in zero-gravity;


Ideally, applicants will:


  • Complete our beginner training course called “Space Salvage Demo”;
  • Complete the feedback form when finishing the demo;
  • Demonstrate the ability to be seated the entire time when on the job.

Special Instructions to Applicants
For full consideration, applicants must apply by downloading the application through the store page.

name: Space Salvage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 7 2700x or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1080, RTX 2070 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: Space Salvage is a first-person adventure seeking game. Your job is to skillfully maneuver your spaceship through wreckage and asteroids while destroying mines and enemy factions! All while your eager yet amoral ship AI guides you. Do you have what it takes to dominate space?
